text: Aap keh dijiye kay aey logo! Mein tum sab ki taraf uss Allah Taalaa ka bheja hua hun jiss ki badshahi tamam aasmanon aur zamin mein hai uss kay siwa koi ibadat kay laeeq nahi wohi zindagi deta hai aur wohi mot deta hai so Allah Taalaa per eman lao aur uss kay nabi ummi per jo kay Allah Taalaa per aur uss kay ehkaam per eman rakhtay hain aur inn ka ittabaa kero takay tum raah per aajao
